column4: Madam please follow me. We have some questions.
Follow me, I'm serious.
We'll get you next time.
Follow me, I'm serious.
Someone saw you steal the dice at the arcade.
Well, that saves us a lot of work. Where are the dice now?
We'll find out the truth.  Where are the dice now?
We'll find out the truth. So again where are the dice?
Then hand them over.

column3: I hid them in the Stable.
column4: We'll check this out carefully later. Until then, you're under arrest.
You'll tell us. Until then, you're under arrest.
You are under arrest as a suspect.
(She takes the dice.) You're under arrest until further notice.
We'll check this out carefully in a moment. Until then, you're under arrest.
Do you have any weapons or drugs on you?
Do you have any weapons or drugs on you?
You bet we can. If you have keys, weapons or drugs, give them up.
Anything else?
Anything else?
Anything else?
Well, let's get you strip-searched. Undress to check.
Guess we'll have to strip-search you to find out.
There you go. Spread your legs and bend over.
Completely undress.
Will it be soon? We can do it differently!
Finally. Spread your legs and bend over.
Complete and a little bit snappy.
She's patting you down. Then she hands you a prisoner suit. Put it on.
Now the shackles.
Now into the cell. I'll check your equipment.
What is that? The Dices. Confiscated.
What is that? Keys. Confiscated.
What is that? Spanking toys. Confiscated.
What is that? Sleeping pills. Confiscated.
All right, your bag is clear.
Let me check your restraints again.
I'm going. Think about your behavior.
